oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pvt. Marion Breeden's silver identification badge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This badge belonged to Pvt. Marion Breeden, Co. D, 12th Miss. Vol. Inf., CSA, from Copah County, Miss. Breeden enlisted at the age of 17 in Corinth, Miss. in May, 1861. His service record shows that he had a "continued fever" and was discharged for disability on Sept. 1, 1861.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
